'''''"...Abandon All Hope, Ye Who Enter Here."''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to locate the [[Viewpoint/Gate of Everlasting Mourning|Gate of Everlasting Mourning]] Viewpoint, which becomes accessible near the end of the {{Quest|As the Khvarena's Light Shows}}.

==Trivia==
* The title of this achievement is the inscription found at the entrance to Hell in ''{{w|Divine Comedy}}'' by {{w|Dante Alighieri}}.
